Title: Establishes the residential open green space tax abatement for certain properties in N.Y. city
Summary: Establishes the residential open green space tax abatement for certain properties in a city of one million or more; provides an abatement for owners who remove an impermeable surface from a residential yard and replace it with soil and vegetation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to establishing the residential open green space tax abatement for certain properties in a city of one million or more
